text: Among states with 5000+ cases, "Florida is the only one that is not under a statewide 'stay-at-home' order...On Tuesday, DeSantis said at a news conference that he had no plans to issue a statewide order because the White House had not told him to do so." https://t.co/pcEaNO2Y3o
